OOC - Hey there, got it!  Sorry for being so snippy over in character and o=
ut of character.  I can see how Tuscon is developing, and hope it will be i=
nteresting and I can contribute to it.  

And I don't mind Wheelie getting =
his cumuppance for his misbheavior, he contributed to it too.

And I was ex=
pecting Rattrap to have an interesting method to deal with Wheelie as well.=
  Looking forwards to things!

And good posting so far, and sorry for being=
 so petty about things or coming off that way!

And I'm fine with the attem=
pt, just don't pose hte result for me and I'm good!

so.

cter. He doesn't usually resort to conflict, but rather letting

> :)

s to power posing, I am perfectly fine with Wheelie ignoring the

damage another character takes, he can only pose the

for posting, I will let the others post first. I don't want to go
